CustomField.formula: IF( AND( ISBLANK( COE__c ), ISBLANK( Lock_Expiration__c ), ISBLANK( LE_Acknowledged_By__c ), ISBLANK( Approval_Expected__c ), ISBLANK( Final_Conditions_In_By__c ), ISBLANK( CD_Out_By__c ), ISBLANK( Appraisal_Contingency__c ), ISBLANK( Loan_Contingency__c ), ISBLANK( Sign_Final_Docs_By__c ), ISBLANK( Rush_Requested__c ), ISBLANK( Hold_Until__c ) ), DATE(2199, 01, 01), DATE(2199, 01, 01) + MIN( IF( ISBLANK(COE__c) || COE__c < TODAY(), DATE(2199, 01, 01), COE__c ) - DATE(2199, 01, 01), IF( ISBLANK(Lock_Expiration__c) || Lock_Expiration__c < TODAY(), DATE(2199, 01, 01), Lock_Expiration__c ) - DATE(2199, 01, 01), IF( ISBLANK(LE_Acknowledged_By__c) || LE_Acknowledged_By__c < TODAY(), DATE(2199, 01, 01), LE_Acknowledged_By__c ) - DATE(2199, 01, 01), IF( ISBLANK(Approval_Expected__c) || Approval_Expected__c < TODAY(), DATE(2199, 01, 01), Approval_Expected__c ) - DATE(2199, 01, 01), IF( ISBLANK(Final_Conditions_In_By__c) || Final_Conditions_In_By__c < TODAY(), DATE(2199, 01, 01), Final_Conditions_In_By__c ) - DATE(2199, 01, 01), IF( ISBLANK(CD_Out_By__c) || CD_Out_By__c < TODAY(), DATE(2199, 01, 01), CD_Out_By__c ) - DATE(2199, 01, 01), IF( ISBLANK(Appraisal_Contingency__c) || Appraisal_Contingency__c < TODAY(), DATE(2199, 01, 01), Appraisal_Contingency__c ) - DATE(2199, 01, 01), IF( ISBLANK(Loan_Contingency__c) || Loan_Contingency__c < TODAY(), DATE(2199, 01, 01), Loan_Contingency__c ) - DATE(2199, 01, 01), IF( ISBLANK(Sign_Final_Docs_By__c) || Sign_Final_Docs_By__c < TODAY(), DATE(2199, 01, 01), Sign_Final_Docs_By__c ) - DATE(2199, 01, 01), IF( ISBLANK(Rush_Requested__c) || Rush_Requested__c < TODAY(), DATE(2199, 01, 01), Rush_Requested__c ) - DATE(2199, 01, 01) ) )
CustomField.label: Next Deadline
